title: iCloud account
extract: iCloud is a cloud storage and cloud computing service from Apple Inc. launched on October 12, 2011. ... The service also provides the means to wirelessly back up iOS devices directly to iCloud, instead of being reliant on manual backups to a host Mac or Windows computer using iTunes.
extract_html: iCloud is a cloud storage and cloud computing service from Apple Inc. launched on October 12, 2011. ... The service also provides the means to wirelessly back up iOS devices directly to iCloud, instead of being reliant on manual backups to a host Mac or Windows computer using iTunes.
